page.title: 17EMPLOYMENT IN KILMARNOCK
page.content: In our survey about employment the three most popular jobs were a factory worker, a shop assistant and a cleaner. We found that 8% had more than one job. We discovered that only 75% worked locally in Kilmarnock. 19% had been at their job for less than a year, 58% for 1-10 years and 23% for more than 10 years. 60% said their job was very important to them, 35% quite important and 5% said not at all important. 67% said men and women should have equal opportunities in their job. 31% had one person employed in their house, 44% two employed, 22% three employed and 3% had four employed. 60% had none unemployed, 22% had one unemployed, 15% had two and 3% had three unemployed in their house. 8% had a person on Y.T.S in their house. 7% were self-employed. 44% said men and women should retire at 60.
